meanings.definition: One side of a sheet of paper in a book, magazine, etc.
meanings.sent1: I turned the page to read the next part of the story.
meanings.sent2: The teacher asked us to write our names at the top of the page.
meanings.sent3: The mischievous squirrel used the page as a tiny blanket.
meanings.sent4: Her smile lit up her face like a bright page in a dark room.
meanings.sent5: The colorful illustrations on the page made the book come alive.
